Articles.Content:
So, I was bored one day... And thought: There are going to be a few planet mods released, or even new stock ones... Why don't I make a planet deleter...

So I present you: The PlanetBuster 9000!

A bomb capable of destroying celestial bodies.

DOWNLOAD:

https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/80556647/PlanetBuster.zip

Fixed for now... Bomb will not work, and the plugin in general is a bit odd

HEAVY BETA, I am not responsible for lost save files, "warranty" void if used on kerbin or kerbol.

Update: Added basic SFX, nothing too fancy, Fixed planet deletion a bit.

Update2: Re-added download, but the bomb doesn't work anymore, planet .cfg deletion works, I guess...

I have created the basic code, and the part itself.

Screenshots:

Wish spoilers worked... sorry about wall of images

So far, My plans are:

Delete planets using a configuration file -Done

Have bomb deleted planets added to the cfg - Done

Have CFG's delete planets based on savegames - Done

Relocate orphaned moons

SFX! - Reverted changes, seems to fail

And a model for the bomb...

Includes source code.

license: Do whatever you want with it, but it would be nice for some credit

Edited January 9, 2014 by KCreator
Formatting+updates

Good luck deleting planets...

Try contacting the guy from Krag's planet factory.

You've made a planet buster!

Planetary destruction + Ksp Players can only end in Mindblowing misuse.
Danny did this with no mods, awhile ago...

Unlike Danny's planetbuster, this will fully destroy a planet, including its atmo fx... And it will be permanent as long as the mod is installed. (And configurable via a file, for deleting planets without the part), and I could add some SFX

but do all the other factions declare vendetta upon you if you use it?

/ obscure joke

as much as i hate Eve i don't think i need to destroy it, but it's good to know the option is there.
Million dollar question: Does this work on Jool?

It should... just ram the thing all the way in, otherwise, edit the config... I will need to improve the config system, though, uses a hard to read XML. Also, beware that orphaned moon's may cause problems, so be careful where you explode!

What happens if you use it on Kerbol? Or does Kerbol eat it first?

EDIT: Also, I think your forum title should probably be "Junior Planet Destroyer" now...
For some reason this reminded me of that old game(cant remember the title) where you created a big planet eating creature and fed it planets to make it bigger:-P

Update: Added basic SFX, nothing too fancy, Fixed planet deletion a bit.

Update2: Bomb doesn't work, but .CFG does

Edited January 8, 2014 by KCreator
extra data
Any chance of a 1.0.2 update for this? I'd love to mess around with it in my career game.
im actually looking for a way to get a 3d model onto ksp rails, namly my halo ring
